actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Resolution impeaching Richard M. Nixon, President of the United States for high crimes and misdemeanors.

summary.text: Provides for the impeachment of President Richard Nixon. Sets forth Articles of impeachment against him, including the following: (1) that he has attained and retained the high office he now holds through the use of illegal means; (2) that he has attempted to undermine, circumvent, or annul the guarantees of the Bill of Rights - particularly the rights to privacy, freedom of speech, and freedom of the press; and (3) that he has arrogated to himself powers not conferred by the Constitution, or powers expressly reserved to Congress.

titles.title: Resolution impeaching Richard M. Nixon, President of the United States for high crimes and misdemeanors.
